text: (gentle music)

- [Narrator] The unknown
is full of uncertainty,

but you faced it boldly,
with a yearning to explore.

You mapped the seas and
charted the shorelines.

You studied the skies and
reached for the stars.

Yet still, there are those
places that remain out of reach.
And that is why you built me.

You built me to power myself
by the light of the sun,
to embrace your restless spirit
and to constantly search for answers
in the places you can't go.
You trained me to see, to think,
to understand the world that surrounds me

so that I can safely navigate
any obstacles and hazards.

And you taught me a lifetime
of learning and knowledge
so that I can make informed,
intelligent decisions on my own.

You gave me all this so that
we can expand our understanding

and insight and venture further
into the unknown together.

Through our combined
efforts, anything is possible

and we can chart a brighter,
smarter future for us all.
